items.value: (%@visitor%) is on his/her way to visit (%@kingdom%) for his/her scheduled State Visit in behalf of (%@king%).
(%@king%) sent (%@spy%) to (%@assassinate%) (%@visitor%) while he/she is in (%@kingdom%) territory to complicate relations.
(%@king%), who dislikes (%@king%), sent (%@envoy%) to sabotage the visit.
(%@envoy%) successfully sabotage the visit causing (%@king%) to resent (%@king%).
(%@visitor%) (%deathreason%) while on the State Visit causing (%@king%) to resent (%@king%).
The State Visit completed with no untoward event. (%@king%) was grateful to (%@king%) for his/her respectful treatment of (%@visitor%).
